blurb: C# is a modern, object-oriented language with lots of great features, such as type-inference and async/await. The tooling is excellent, and there is extensive, well-written documentation.

key_features.title: Modern
key_features.content: C# is a modern, fast-evolving language.

key_features.title: Cross-platform
key_features.content: C# runs on almost any platform and chipset.

key_features.title: Multi-paradigm
key_features.content: C# is primarily an object-oriented language, but also has lots of functional features.

key_features.title: General purpose
key_features.content: C# can be used for a wide variety of workloads, like websites, console applications, and even games.

key_features.title: Tooling
key_features.content: C# has excellent tooling, with linting and advanced refactoring options built-in.

key_features.title: Documentation
key_features.content: Documentation is excellent and exhaustive, making it easy to get started with C#.
